    public class ListenerSource
extends ca.uqac.lif.cep.tmf.Source
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    A Source processor that can be added as an ActionListener to an AWT or Swing widget.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©
